name: Assignee for Task Count
query:
SELECT
    COALESCE(u.full_name, t.allocated_to) AS "Employee:Data:250",
    COUNT(td.name) AS "Total Tasks:Int:120"
FROM `tabToDo` t
JOIN `tabTask` td
    ON t.reference_name = td.name
LEFT JOIN `tabUser` u
    ON u.name = t.allocated_to
WHERE
    t.reference_type = 'Task'
    AND td.docstatus < 2
    AND (%(project)s IS NULL OR td.project = %(project)s)
GROUP BY COALESCE(u.full_name, t.allocated_to)
ORDER BY COUNT(td.name) DESC
